EntryName	PIRC1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Piercer of microtubule wall 1 protein (Pierce1) (UPF0691 protein C9orf116) (p53-induced expression in RB-null cells protein 1)
GeneName	PIERCE1
Length	136
Function	Microtubule inner protein involved in the attachment of outer dynein arms (ODAs) to dynein-decorated doublet microtubules (DMTs) in cilia axoneme, which is required for motile cilia beating (PubMed:36191189). Functions at the initial step of left-right asymmetry specification of the visceral organs.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Cilium axoneme; Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Flagellum axoneme
